entries.meaning: (rare) Personal address via apostrophe (an exclamatory speech).
examples: He was no doubt not superior to the apostrophation of his time;  […]

entries.meaning: (rare) The omission of parts of a word by means of an apostrophe (punctuation mark), contraction.
examples: In some cases, however, the apostrophation failed of its purpose, if its purpose were indeed the reduction of redundant syllables:  […]
